trans-unit.source: Encapsulates all HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 封裝所有關於個別 HTTP 要求的 HTTP 特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule> and <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interfaces are provided a reference to an <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別<xref:System.Web.IHttpModule>和<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>介面所提供的參考<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>目前 HTTP 要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object provides access to the intrinsic <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A> properties for the request.
trans-unit.target: 此物件提供存取內建<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A>要求屬性。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192422).
trans-unit.target: 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192422)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access and display properties of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何存取和顯示的屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>物件。

trans-unit.source: The context of the current HTTP request is accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的內容會使用來存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> class that uses the specified worker-request object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體使用指定的背景工作要求物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> class by using the specified request and response objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的要求和回應物件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Accepts an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request.
trans-unit.target: 接受 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 要求。

trans-unit.source: The user function.
trans-unit.target: 使用者函式。

trans-unit.source: Accepts an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request using the specified user function.
trans-unit.target: 接受使用指定使用者函式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 要求。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AcceptWebSocketRequest%2A> method overload and passing `null` for the `options` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AcceptWebSocketRequest%2A>方法多載，並傳遞`null`如`options`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="userFunc" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="userFunc" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The request is not an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request.
trans-unit.target: 要求不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 要求。

trans-unit.source: The user function.
trans-unit.target: 使用者函式。

trans-unit.source: The options object.
trans-unit.target: 選項物件。

trans-unit.source: Accepts an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request using the specified user function and options object.
trans-unit.target: 接受使用指定使用者函式和選項物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 要求。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="userFunc" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="userFunc" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The request is not an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request.
trans-unit.target: 要求不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 要求。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> to add to the exception collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入例外狀況集合的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an exception to the exception collection for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 將例外狀況加入目前 HTTP 要求的例外狀況集合。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP context object.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 內容物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises a virtual event that occurs when the HTTP part of the request is ending.
trans-unit.target: 引發虛擬事件，該事件會在要求的 HTTP 部分結束時發生。

trans-unit.source: The subscription token.
trans-unit.target: 訂閱語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> connection begins.
trans-unit.target: 此事件之前發生<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket>連接一開始。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="callback" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callback" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of errors accumulated while processing an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得處理 HTTP 要求時累積的錯誤陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> objects for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous operations are allowed during parts of ASP.NET request processing when they are not expected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示在 ASP.NET 要求各部分處理期間，是否允許未預期的非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if ASP.NET will throw an exception when the asynchronous API is used at a time when it is not expected; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ASP.NET 在未預期的情況下使用了非同步 API 而擲回例外狀況，則為 <see langword="false" />；否則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this flag is not set to `true`, ASP.NET will throw an exception when it detects the application misusing the async API.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個旗標未設為`true`，ASP.NET 將會擲回例外狀況，當它偵測到濫用非同步 API 的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This can occur if you try to call an asynchronous method during a part of the request processing pipeline where asynchronous operations are not expected, or if there is still outstanding asynchronous work when an asynchronous module or handler signals completion.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試呼叫非同步方法時，部分的要求處理管線，未預期的非同步作業，或如果沒有仍未完成的非同步工作時，非同步模組或處理常式發出訊號完成，這可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is meant as a safety net to let you know early on if you're writing async code that doesn't fit expected patterns and might have negative side effects.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可作為安全網，可讓您知道在初期是否您正在撰寫非同步程式碼不符合預期模式和可能有負面影響。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplicationState" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplicationState" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplicationState" /> for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplicationState" />。

trans-unit.source: To get the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> object for the current HTTP request, use <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.ApplicationInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> 物件，請使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.ApplicationInstance" />

trans-unit.source: (ASP.NET uses <see langword="ApplicationInstance" /> instead of <see langword="Application" /> as a property name to refer to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> instance in order to avoid confusion between ASP.NET and classic ASP.
trans-unit.target: (ASP.NET 會使用 <see langword="ApplicationInstance" /> 而不是 <see langword="Application" /> 做為屬性名稱來參考目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> 執行個體，以避免 ASP.NET 與傳統 ASP 混淆。

trans-unit.source: In classic ASP, <see langword="Application" /> refers to the global application state dictionary.)
trans-unit.target: 在傳統 ASP 中，<see langword="Application" /> 會參考全域應用程式狀態字典)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" />。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses <see langword="ApplicationInstance" /> instead of <see langword="Application" /> as a property name to refer to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> instance in order to avoid confusion between ASP.NET and classic ASP.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會使用 <see langword="ApplicationInstance" /> 而不是 <see langword="Application" /> 做為屬性名稱來參考目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> 執行個體，以避免 ASP.NET 與傳統 ASP 混淆。

trans-unit.source: In classic ASP, <see langword="Application" /> refers to the global application state dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 在傳統 ASP 中，<see langword="Application" /> 會參考全域應用程式狀態字典。

trans-unit.source: The Web application is running under IIS 7.0 in Integrated mode, and an attempt was made to change the property value from a non-null value to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式正在 IIS 7.0 下的整合模式中執行，並且嘗試將屬性值從非 Null 值變更為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains flags that pertain to asynchronous preload mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，其中包含有關非同步預先載入模式的旗標。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains flags that pertain to asynchronous preload mode.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關非同步預先載入模式之旗標的物件。

trans-unit.source: The first time this property is accessed, the object that contains flags for asynchronous preload mode is loaded from the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.AsyncPreloadMode%2A> setting in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 第一次存取這個屬性時，包含非同步預先載入模式的旗標的物件載入從<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.AsyncPreloadMode%2A>組態檔中設定。

trans-unit.source: Although this property can be set programmatically, changing the property value only has effect if the property is set before the `ExecuteRequestHandler` step in the ASP.NET request pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 雖然可以透過程式設計方式設定這個屬性，但變更屬性值只有在屬性是在 ASP.NET 要求管線中的 `ExecuteRequestHandler` 步驟之前所設定時才有效果。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式定義域的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 目前應用程式定義域的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" />。

trans-unit.source: There is one instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> class per application domain.
trans-unit.target: 一個執行個體的<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>類別每個應用程式網域。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> object that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Cache%2A> property is the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> object for all requests in the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>所傳回的物件<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Cache%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>應用程式定義域中的所有要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: Clears all errors for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 清除目前 HTTP 要求的所有錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> instance for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This property is a static property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是靜態的屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>類別。

trans-unit.source: The property stores the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance that applies to the current request.
trans-unit.target: 屬性存放區<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>套用至目前要求的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The properties of this instance are the non-static properties of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的屬性是非靜態屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>目前 HTTP 要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AddError%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ClearError%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods and the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AllErrors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A>屬性來存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AddError%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ClearError%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AllErrors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example creates three custom exceptions using the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AddError%2A> method and uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AllErrors%2A> property to load these exceptions to an array.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立三個自訂的例外狀況，使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AddError%2A>方法，並使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AllErrors%2A>屬性載入至陣列，這些例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: It then writes the array to the containing page and uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ClearError%2A> method to clear all the errors from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 然後將陣列寫入所包含的網頁，並使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ClearError%2A>方法，以清除所有錯誤<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object that represents the currently executing handler.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> 物件，代表目前正在執行的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> that represents the currently executing handler.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" />，代表目前正在執行的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The currently executing handler that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentHandler%2A> property might be different than the handler that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Handler%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 目前正在執行的處理常式所參考<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentHandler%2A>屬性可能不同於所參考的處理常式<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Handler%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This can occur when another handler was requested by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是另一個處理常式使用要求時<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法或<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the currently executing handler finishes processing, the previously determined handler is restored.
trans-unit.target: 當目前正在執行的處理常式完成處理時，會還原先前決定的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.RequestNotification" /> value that indicates the current <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> event that is processing.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.RequestNotification" /> 值，表示目前正在處理的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.RequestNotification" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.RequestNotification" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A> property requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A>屬性需要的整合式的管線模式中[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]且至少為.NET Framework 3.0 版。

trans-unit.source: When available, the property returns a <xref:System.Web.RequestNotification> value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可用時，傳回<xref:System.Web.RequestNotification>值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A> property indicates which event in the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> instance is currently processing the request.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A>屬性會指出在哪些事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>執行個體目前正在處理要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A> property is not intended to be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A>屬性不用來設定。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is set by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] during the processing of the request in the ASP.NET pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它由所設定[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]ASP.NET 管線中的要求處理期間。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A> property will result in a compilation error.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A>屬性會導致編譯錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A> property to determine what event of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object that is handling the current request is being processed.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A>屬性來判斷哪些事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>正在處理正在處理目前要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the event handler handles several events of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object, and the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A> property determines what code is invoked for each event being handled.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，事件處理常式會處理多個事件的<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>物件，而<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.CurrentNotification%2A>屬性會決定哪些程式碼會叫用處理每個事件。

trans-unit.source: The operation requires integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 作業要求 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 必須以整合式管線模式執行，而且 .NET Framework 必須至少為 3.0 版。

trans-unit.source: The object whose <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> method must be called when the <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection part of the request is completed.
trans-unit.target: 當要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 連接部分完成時，必須呼叫其 <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> 方法的物件。

trans-unit.source: Enables an object's <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> method to be called when the <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection part of this request is completed.
trans-unit.target: 允許在這個要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 連接部分完成時，呼叫物件的 <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The subscription token.
trans-unit.target: 訂閱語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method of the target object is called after both the HTTP part of the request and the <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> connection have ended.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>目標物件的方法呼叫之後這兩個 HTTP 要求一部分而<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket>連線已經結束。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object is not available for inspection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>物件不能進行檢查。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first error (if any) accumulated during HTTP request processing.

trans-unit.source: In some editing environments, such as [!INCLUDE[vwprvw](~/includes/vwprvw-md.md)], the editor might throw a design-time <xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException> exception if you use a period (.) in the global resource-key name.

trans-unit.source: However, this does not affect your ability to edit or save the file, and you can ignore the error.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object responsible for processing the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定負責處理 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> responsible for processing the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 負責處理 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Handler%2A> property contains a reference to the handler that processes the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Handler%2A>屬性包含處理常式來處理 HTTP 要求的參考。

trans-unit.source: The handler can be specified by using the element, or by using a custom handler defined in user code.
trans-unit.target: 使用項目，或使用使用者程式碼中定義的自訂處理常式，則可以指定的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handlers, see [HTTP Handlers and HTTP Modules Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f540bdeb-d22e-4e1d-ba8a-fe6c9926283b).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱[HTTP 處理常式和 HTTP 模組概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f540bdeb-d22e-4e1d-ba8a-fe6c9926283b)。

trans-unit.source: The reference to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Handler%2A> property will remain the same even after the current page has been changed by a server-side method, such as the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Handler%2A>即使目前的頁面已變更伺服器端方法，例如，屬性會維持相同<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>方法或<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether custom errors are enabled for the current HTTP request.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if custom errors are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用自訂錯誤，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果要求處於偵錯模式，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that is the current processing point in the ASP.NET pipeline just after an <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> event has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這是在 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> 事件完成處理之後 ASP.NET 管線中目前正在處理的點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if custom errors are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用自訂錯誤，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A> property is only supported with the integrated mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A>整合模式中才支援屬性[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]且至少.NET Framework 3.0。

trans-unit.source: When available, the property returns a Boolean value that indicates whether an event in the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可用時，會傳回布林值，指出是否將事件列<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>物件已完成處理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A> property is not intended to be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A>屬性不用來設定。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is provided by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to the ASP.NET runtime for each notification.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它由[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]ASP.NET 執行階段，每個通知。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A> property will result in a compilation error.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A>屬性會導致編譯錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In scenarios where multiple events of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object are handled by one event handler, you can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A> property in combination with the <xref:System.Web.RequestNotification> enumeration to precisely determine where in the application lifecycle the current request is.
trans-unit.target: 在案例中位置的多個事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>物件由一個事件處理常式處理，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A>屬性結合<xref:System.Web.RequestNotification>精確判斷在應用程式生命週期目前在列舉要求是。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A> property to determine when an event of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object has finished processing all the associated event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A>屬性來判斷的事件時<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>物件已完成處理所有相關聯的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The custom event handler in this example handles several events of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object, and the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A> property is used to determine what code is invoked after a specific event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中的自訂事件處理常式會處理多個事件的<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>物件，而<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.IsPostNotification%2A>屬性用來判斷哪些程式碼會叫用處理特定事件之後。

trans-unit.source: The operation requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此作業要求 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 必須以整合式管線模式執行，而且 .NET Framework 必須至少為 3.0。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the request is an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示要求是否為 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 要求。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the request is an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求是 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 要求，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if the request contains the initial <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> handshake and the `WebSocket` module of IIS is active.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`true`如果要求包含初始<xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket>交握和`WebSocket`的 IIS 模組是使用中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the connection is upgrading from an HTTP connection to an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示連接是否正從 HTTP 連接升級為 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 連接。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the connection is upgrading; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接正在升級，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a key/value collection that can be used to organize and share data between an <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpModule" /> interface and an <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> interface during an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引鍵/值集合，可在 HTTP 要求期間，用來組織及共用 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpModule" /> 介面和 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> 介面之間的資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> key/value collection that provides access to an individual value in the collection by a specified key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> 索引鍵/值集合，根據指定的索引鍵提供對集合中個別值的存取。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the page-instrumentation service instance for this request.
trans-unit.target: 取得這項要求之頁面檢測服務執行個體的參考。

trans-unit.source: The page-instrumentation service instance for this request.
trans-unit.target: 這項要求的頁面檢測服務執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object for the parent handler.
trans-unit.target: 取得父處理常式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> instance, or <see langword="null" /> if no previous handler was found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> 執行個體；如果找不到先前的處理常式，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.PreviousHandler%2A> property corresponds to the last handler before the current request was executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.PreviousHandler%2A>屬性會對應到最後一個處理常式執行目前要求之前。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase" /> object for the current user profile.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前使用者設定檔的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase" /> if the application configuration file contains a definition for the profile's properties; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式組態檔包含設定檔屬性的定義，則為 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase" />；否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property is used for persistent storage of structured data using a type-safe API.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>屬性用於永續性儲存體的使用類型安全的應用程式開發介面的結構化資料。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property is accessed but no value is present, an empty instance is returned; `null` is not returned.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>存取屬性，但沒有值存在，則會傳回空的執行個體;`null`就不會傳回。

trans-unit.source: The object that should process the request.
trans-unit.target: 應該處理這個要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: Enables you to specify a handler for the request.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您指定要求的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If you set `handler` to `null`, the default handler is used to process the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定`handler`至`null`的預設處理常式用來處理要求。

trans-unit.source: You can set `handler` to either an asynchronous handler or to an synchronous handler.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定`handler`非同步處理常式或同步處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The handler must implement the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式必須實作<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpContext.RemapHandler(System.Web.IHttpHandler)" /> method was called after the <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.MapRequestHandler" /> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpContext.RemapHandler(System.Web.IHttpHandler)" /> 方法已在 <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.MapRequestHandler" /> 事件發生之後呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>屬性會提供以程式設計方式存取的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>類別。

trans-unit.source: Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace (which contains the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class), you can reference the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 因為 ASP.NET 網頁包含預設參考<xref:System.Web>命名空間 (其中包含<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>類別)，您可以參考的成員<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>在.aspx 頁面上，而不需要使用完整的類別參考給<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use `Request.Browser` to get the capabilities of the client browser.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用`Request.Browser`來取得用戶端瀏覽器的功能。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in <xref:System.Web> that you want to use.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要使用的成員<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>從 ASP.NET 程式碼後置模組，您必須將參考併入到<xref:System.Web>命名空間模組以及目前作用中的要求/回應內容的完整的參考，在類別<xref:System.Web>您想要使用的。

trans-unit.source: For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，程式碼後置頁面在您必須指定完整格式的名稱`HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET will throw an exception if you try to use this property when the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> object is not available.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會擲回例外狀況，如果您嘗試使用這個屬性時<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>物件不能。

trans-unit.source: For example, this would be true in the Application_Start method of the Global.asax file, or in a method that is called from the Application_Start method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，這會在 Application_Start 方法的 Global.asax 檔案中，或從 Application_Start 方法呼叫的方法，則為 true。

trans-unit.source: At that time no HTTP request has been created yet.
trans-unit.target: 在該時間有尚未建立任何 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: The Web application is running under IIS 7 in Integrated mode.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式正在 IIS 7 下的整合模式中執行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" /> object for the current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 HTTP 回應的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" /> for the current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 回應的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponse" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>屬性會提供以程式設計方式存取的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>類別。

trans-unit.source: Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace (which contains the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class), you can reference the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 因為 ASP.NET 網頁包含預設參考<xref:System.Web>命名空間 (其中包含<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>類別)，您可以參考的成員<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>在.aspx 頁面上，而不需要使用完整的類別參考給<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use `Response.Write("some output")` to write output to an HTTP output stream.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用`Response.Write("some output")`將輸出寫入 HTTP 輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to the currently active request/response context and the class in <xref:System.Web> that you want to use.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要使用的成員<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>從 ASP.NET 程式碼後置模組，您必須將參考併入到<xref:System.Web>模組和目前作用中的要求/回應內容的完整的參考中的類別中的命名空間<xref:System.Web>您想要使用的。

trans-unit.source: For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，程式碼後置頁面在您必須指定完整格式的名稱`HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`。

trans-unit.source: The Web application is running under IIS 7 in Integrated mode.
trans-unit.target: Web 應用程式正在 IIS 7 下的整合模式中執行。

trans-unit.source: Redirects a request for a resource to a different path than the one that is indicated by the requested URL.
trans-unit.target: 將資源的要求重新導向至與要求的 URL 所指不同的路徑。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath" /> is used in cookieless session state to strip session IDs from URLs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath" /> 是在無 Cookie 工作階段狀態中用來刪除 URL 的工作階段識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The internal rewrite path.
trans-unit.target: 內部重寫路徑。

trans-unit.source: Rewrites the URL using the given path.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的路徑重寫 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29> method redirects a request for a resource to a different path than the one that is indicated by the requested URL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29>方法資源的要求重新導向至與要求的 URL 會以不同的路徑。

trans-unit.source: If you have to reset the virtual path so that requests from the client for server resources resolve correctly, use the overload of this method that takes the `rebaseClientPath` parameter and set the parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您必須重設虛擬路徑，以便正確地解析來自用戶端的伺服器資源的要求，請使用會採用此方法的多載`rebaseClientPath`參數並將參數設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages.
trans-unit.target: URL 重寫時，您想要重新建構您的 Web 應用程式中的頁面，而且您想要確定，已設為書籤的舊 Url 的人員仍然可以使用它們之後移動頁面。

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location.
trans-unit.target: URL 重寫，可讓您明確地將要求轉送到新的網頁位置。

trans-unit.source: If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要啟用網站的 Url，更加易懂易記，而且已最佳化，用於搜尋引擎，更健全的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%2A> method to enable a Web site to respond to URLs that do not reflect the file structure in the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%2A>方法，以啟用網站以回應不會反映在網站上的檔案結構的 Url。

trans-unit.source: The first block of code is an ASP.NET Web page that is named RewritePath.aspx.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼的第一個區塊是名為 RewritePath.aspx ASP.NET Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: It requires a query string.
trans-unit.target: 它需要的查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: If the name of your site is WebSite1, the URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/RewritePath.aspx?page=1` displays "Page 1" in the browser.
trans-unit.target: 如果您網站的名稱是 URL，WebSite1`http://localhost/WebSite1/RewritePath.aspx?page=1`瀏覽器中顯示 「 第 1 頁 」。

trans-unit.source: The block of code that follows the Web page is the `Application_BeginRequest` event handler in the Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: 遵循網頁上的程式碼區塊是`Application_BeginRequest`Global.asax 檔中的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This code intercepts requests for URLs such as `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` and converts them to the form that is required for RewritePath.aspx before they are processed.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會攔截要求 Url 的這類`http://localhost/WebSite1/page1`並將它們轉換成它們在處理之前所需的 RewritePath.aspx 表單。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` invokes RewritePath.aspx with the query-string parameter that displays "Page 1" in the browser.
trans-unit.target: 因此，URL`http://localhost/WebSite1/page1`會 RewritePath.aspx 叫用的瀏覽器中顯示 「 第 1 頁 」 的查詢字串參數。

trans-unit.source: If a URL such as `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` is received, an overload of <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%2A> is invoked that enables you to provide a value for the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PathInfo%2A> property as well as a query string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果 URL，例如`http://localhost/WebSite1/page1`接收時，多載的<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%2A>叫用，可讓您提供值給<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PathInfo%2A>屬性，以及查詢字串參數。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is not in the current application's root directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數不在目前應用程式的根目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The internal rewrite path.
trans-unit.target: 內部重寫路徑。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to reset the virtual path; <see langword="false" /> to keep the virtual path unchanged.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要重設虛擬路徑；<see langword="false" /> 表示要保持虛擬路徑不變。

trans-unit.source: Rewrites the URL using the given path and a Boolean value that specifies whether the virtual path for server resources is modified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的路徑和布林值重寫 URL，這個布林值會指定是否已修改伺服器資源的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with the `rebaseClientPath` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`rebaseClientPath`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the virtual path that is used to construct paths to resources is not modified, set the `rebaseClientPath` parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保不會修改用來建構資源路徑的虛擬路徑，將`rebaseClientPath`參數`false`。

trans-unit.source: A common scenario in which you might want to set `rebaseClientPath` to `false` is when you need to rewrite the URL, and you are using themes and redirecting the URL to a resource located in a different folder than the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 常見的案例，您可能想設定`rebaseClientPath`至`false`時，您需要重寫 URL，而且您會使用佈景主題，並將 URL 重新導向至位於不同的資料夾所要求的資源的資源。

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages.
trans-unit.target: URL 重寫時，您想要重新建構您的 Web 應用程式中的頁面，而且您想要確定，已設為書籤的舊 Url 的人員仍然可以使用它們之後移動頁面。

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location.
trans-unit.target: URL 重寫，可讓您明確地將要求轉送到新的網頁位置。

trans-unit.source: If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要啟用網站的 Url，更加易懂易記，而且已最佳化，用於搜尋引擎，更健全的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is not in the current application's root directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數不在目前應用程式的根目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The internal rewrite path.
trans-unit.target: 內部重寫路徑。

trans-unit.source: Additional path information for a resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源的額外路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.PathInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.PathInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The request query string.
trans-unit.target: 要求查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: Rewrites the URL by using the given path, path information, and query string information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的路徑、路徑資訊和查詢字串資訊重寫 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%2A> method redirects a request for a resource to another resource without changing the URL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%2A>方法將要求重新導向之資源的另一個資源而不需要變更 URL。

trans-unit.source: The `filePath` parameter does not include the `pathInfo` parameter content.
trans-unit.target: `filePath`參數不包括`pathInfo`參數內容。

trans-unit.source: For the URL http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail, the `filePath` parameter is http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html, and the `pathInfo` parameter is tail.
trans-unit.target: Url http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail、`filePath`參數是http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html，而`pathInfo`參數為結尾。

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages.
trans-unit.target: URL 重寫時，您想要重新建構您的 Web 應用程式中的頁面，而且您想要確定，已設為書籤的舊 Url 的人員仍然可以使用它們之後移動頁面。

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location.
trans-unit.target: URL 重寫，可讓您明確地將要求轉送到新的網頁位置。

trans-unit.source: If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要啟用網站的 Url，更加易懂易記，而且已最佳化，用於搜尋引擎，更健全的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, including an example of this method overload, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，包括範例的這個方法多載，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is not in the current application's root directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數不在目前應用程式的根目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="filePath" /> parameter is not in the current application's root directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filePath" /> 參數不在目前應用程式的根目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the resource that services the request.
trans-unit.target: 對要求提供服務之資源的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: Additional path information to use for the URL redirect.
trans-unit.target: 用於 URL 重新導向的其他路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.PathInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.PathInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The request query string to use for the URL redirect.
trans-unit.target: 用於 URL 重新導向的要求查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set the file path used for client resources to the value of the <c>filePath</c> parameter; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要將用戶端資源所使用的檔案路徑設定為 <c>filePath</c> 參數的值；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Rewrites the URL using the given virtual path, path information, query string information, and a Boolean value that specifies whether the client file path is set to the rewrite path.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的虛擬路徑、路徑資訊、查詢字串資訊和布林值重寫 URL，這個布林值會指定用戶端檔案路徑是否已設為重寫路徑。

trans-unit.source: The `filePath` parameter does not include the content of the `pathInfo` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `filePath`參數不包含的內容`pathInfo`參數。

trans-unit.source: For the URL http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail, the `filePath` parameter is http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html, and the `pathInfo` parameter is tail.
trans-unit.target: Url http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail、`filePath`參數是http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html，而`pathInfo`參數為結尾。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the virtual path that is used to construct paths to resources is not modified, set the `setClientFilePath` parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保不會修改用來建構資源路徑的虛擬路徑，將`setClientFilePath`參數`false`。

trans-unit.source: A common scenario in which you might want to set `setClientFilePath` to `false` is when you need to rewrite the URL, and you are using themes and redirecting the URL to a resource located in a different folder than the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 常見的案例，您可能想設定`setClientFilePath`至`false`時，您需要重寫 URL，而且您會使用佈景主題，並將 URL 重新導向至位於不同的資料夾所要求的資源的資源。

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages.
trans-unit.target: URL 重寫時，您想要重新建構您的 Web 應用程式中的頁面，而且您想要確定，已設為書籤的舊 Url 的人員仍然可以使用它們之後移動頁面。

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location.
trans-unit.target: URL 重寫，可讓您明確地將要求轉送到新的網頁位置。

trans-unit.source: If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要啟用網站的 Url，更加易懂易記，而且已最佳化，用於搜尋引擎，更健全的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is not in the current application's root directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數不在目前應用程式的根目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="filePath" /> parameter is not in the current application's root directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filePath" /> 參數不在目前應用程式的根目錄中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpServerUtility" /> object that provides methods used in processing Web requests.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpServerUtility" /> 物件，這個物件提供用於處理 Web 要求的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpServerUtility" /> for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpServerUtility" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A> property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A>屬性會提供以程式設計方式存取的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>類別。

trans-unit.source: Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace (which contains the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class), you can reference the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 因為 ASP.NET 網頁包含預設參考<xref:System.Web>命名空間 (其中包含<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>類別)，您可以參考的成員<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>在.aspx 頁面上，而不需要使用完整的類別參考給<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use `Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")` to create an instance of a COM object on the server.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用`Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`在伺服器上建立 COM 物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in <xref:System.Web> that you want to use.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要使用的成員<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>從 ASP.NET 程式碼後置模組，您必須將參考併入到<xref:System.Web>命名空間模組以及目前作用中的要求/回應內容的完整的參考，在類別<xref:System.Web>您想要使用的。

trans-unit.source: For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，程式碼後置頁面在您必須指定完整格式的名稱`HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>屬性會提供以程式設計方式存取的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>類別。

trans-unit.source: In order to use session state you have to enable it.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用工作階段狀態，您必須啟用它。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to enable session state, see **Configuring Session State** in [ASP.NET Session State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何啟用工作階段狀態資訊，請參閱**設定工作階段狀態**中[ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to save values in session state, see [How to: Save Values in Session State](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a6cb2e3a-df49-4b12-9d9a-eed45541c165).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何將值儲存在工作階段狀態資訊，請參閱[How to： 將值儲存在工作階段狀態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a6cb2e3a-df49-4b12-9d9a-eed45541c165)。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to read values from session state, see [How to: Read Values from Session State](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2ef449bc-5c17-4785-b7cf-378c601af8f5).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何從工作階段狀態中讀取的值資訊，請參閱[How to： 從工作階段狀態的讀取值](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2ef449bc-5c17-4785-b7cf-378c601af8f5)。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show how to save values in session state and how to read values from session state.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何在工作階段狀態中儲存值以及如何將讀取工作階段狀態的值。

trans-unit.source: These examples require:
trans-unit.target: 這些範例需要：

trans-unit.source: An ASP.NET application that has session state enabled.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式已啟用的工作階段狀態。

trans-unit.source: A Web Forms page class that has access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, or any class that has access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 有權存取的 Web Form 頁面類別<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性或具有存取權的任何類別<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies what type of session state behavior is required.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定所需之工作階段狀態行為的類型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the type of session state behavior that is required in order to support an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 設定支援 HTTP 要求所需之工作階段狀態行為的類型。

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET default implementation, an HTTP request handler indicates whether it requires session state by implementing the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IRequiresSessionState> interface or the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IReadOnlySessionState> interface.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 預設實作中，HTTP 要求處理常式會指出它是否需要工作階段狀態，藉由實作<xref:System.Web.SessionState.IRequiresSessionState>介面或<xref:System.Web.SessionState.IReadOnlySessionState>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> method and the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateBehavior> enumeration let you provide more detail about what type of session state support is required in order to handle a request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateBehavior>列舉型別可讓您提供有關處理要求所需的工作階段狀態支援之類型的其他詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateBehavior> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateBehavior> 列舉。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> method must be called before the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState> pipeline event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A>之前，必須呼叫方法<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState>管線事件。

trans-unit.source: Calls that occur during or after this event will cause an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 發生於期間或之後此事件的呼叫會導致<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState" /> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState" /> 事件後會呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule" /> object should skip the authorization check for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule" /> 物件是否應該略過目前要求的授權檢查。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule" /> should skip the authorization check; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule" /> 應該略過授權檢查，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SkipAuthorization%2A> property is intended for advanced use by authentication modules that need to redirect to a page that allows anonymous connections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SkipAuthorization%2A>屬性需要重新導向至網頁，可讓匿名連線的驗證模組時，僅供進階使用。

trans-unit.source: The Forms authentication module and Passport authentication module both set <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SkipAuthorization%2A> when redirecting to a configured logon page.
trans-unit.target: 設定兩個設定的表單驗證模組和 Passport 驗證模組<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SkipAuthorization%2A>時將重新導向至設定的登入頁面。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SkipAuthorization%2A> requires the `ControlPrincipal` flag to be set.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SkipAuthorization%2A>需要`ControlPrincipal`旗標設定。

trans-unit.source: For information about the `ControlPrincipal` flag, see <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊`ControlPrincipal`旗標，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>。

trans-unit.source: A type of <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> service to set the service provider to.
trans-unit.target: 設定服務提供者為 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 服務的類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object for the current service type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前服務類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if no service is found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" />；如果找不到服務，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to gain access to the underlying <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest> object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法適合用來存取基礎<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the ASP.NET runtime should call <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort" /> on the thread that is servicing this request when the request times out.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定 ASP.NET 執行階段是否應該在要求逾時的情況下，於對這項要求提供服務的執行緒上呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort" /> will be called when the thread times out; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在執行緒逾時的情況下會呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort" />，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In handlers and modules that are using the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.TimedOutToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to implement cooperative cancellation, you might wish to disable the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> behavior that ASP.NET performs by default when a request times out. Setting this property to `false` can help you make sure that cancellation and cleanup routines will run without being interrupted by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式和使用的模組中<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.TimedOutToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來實作合作式取消作業，您可能想要停用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>ASP.NET 預設會執行要求逾時的行為。此屬性設定為`false`可以協助您確保取消作業和清除的常式將會執行不含 ASP.NET 所中斷。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `false`, ASP.NET will not automatically display a "Request timed out" error page when a timeout occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此屬性設定為`false`，ASP.NET 不會自動顯示 「 要求已逾時 」 錯誤頁面發生逾時。

trans-unit.source: The application is responsible for setting the response content appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式會負責設定適當的回應內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the initial timestamp of the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 HTTP 要求的初始時間戳記。

trans-unit.source: The timestamp of the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的時間戳記。

trans-unit.source: The timestamp returned from the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Timestamp%2A> property is the local time of the server and is set during the instantiation of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 從傳回的時間戳記<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Timestamp%2A>屬性是伺服器的當地時間和設定的具現化期間<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>物件。

trans-unit.source: The local time is equal to the UTC time plus the UTC offset.
trans-unit.target: 本地時間是 UTC 時間，加上的 UTC 位移。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.TraceContext" /> object for the current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 HTTP 回應的 <see cref="T:System.Web.TraceContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.TraceContext" /> for the current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 回應的 <see cref="T:System.Web.TraceContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets security information for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前 HTTP 要求的安全性資訊。

trans-unit.source: Security information for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的安全性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性會提供以程式設計方式存取的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>介面。

trans-unit.source: Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace (which contains the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class), you can reference the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 因為 ASP.NET 網頁包含預設參考<xref:System.Web>命名空間 (其中包含<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>類別)，您可以參考的成員<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>在.aspx 頁面上，而不需要使用完整的類別參考給<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use `User.Identity.Name` to get the name of the user on whose behalf the current process is running.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用`User.Identity.Name`取得的使用者名稱代表其目前的處理序正在執行。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use the members of <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in <xref:System.Web> that you want to use.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要使用的成員<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>從 ASP.NET 程式碼後置模組，您必須將參考併入到<xref:System.Web>命名空間模組以及目前作用中的要求/回應內容的完整的參考，在類別<xref:System.Web>您想要使用的。

trans-unit.source: For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，程式碼後置頁面在您必須指定完整格式的名稱`HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to access properties of the current user through the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何存取屬性的目前使用者已透過<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Those properties are used to set the title of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性可用來設定網頁的標題。

trans-unit.source: If the application uses Windows authentication, the user name includes the domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式使用 Windows 驗證，使用者名稱包括網域 」。

trans-unit.source: For example, the page title would be "Home page for DOMAIN\username".
trans-unit.target: 例如，頁面標題是"首頁上的 網域 \ 使用者名稱 」。

trans-unit.source: Gets the negotiated protocol that was sent from the server to the client for an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 連接之從伺服器傳送至用戶端的交涉通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: The negotiated protocol.
trans-unit.target: 交涉通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ordered list of protocols requested by the client.
trans-unit.target: 取得用戶端所要求的已排序通訊協定清單。

trans-unit.source: The requested protocols, or <see langword="null" /> if this is not an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request or if no list is present.
trans-unit.target: 所要求的通訊協定；如果這不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> 要求，或沒有清單，則為 <see langword="null" />。
